title: ICalloutLengthVariable.TolerancePrecision
description: Gets or sets number of digits after the decimal point to display the primary tolerance value for the length variable in a hole callout.
returns: Number of digits after the decimal point to display the primary tolerance value
remarks:
Call
IDisplayDimension::SetPrecision3
to set the dual tolerance value for a display dimension for a hole callout.
